title: DNS Servers
description: Configure DNS servers for your domain.

anycast.description: DNS Anycast distributes DNS queries to the geographically closest server, reducing latency.
anycast.advantage1: Reduced latency - Response from the closest server
anycast.advantage4: Zero config - Automatic activation, no action required
anycast.noCommitment: No commitment, can be terminated at any time
anycast.acceptCGU: I accept the terms and conditions
anycast.errorAcceptCGU: You must accept the terms and conditions
anycast.terminateConfirm: Are you sure you want to terminate DNS Anycast for {{domain}}?
anycast.terminateDescription: DNS Anycast distributes DNS queries to the geographically closest server.
anycast.terminateWarning: Termination will take effect at the end of the current billing period.

change.title: Change DNS servers
change.description: Choose between OVHcloud DNS servers or external DNS servers.
change.propagationWarning: DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours.
change.modeCustomDesc: Use your own external DNS servers.
change.optionOvhDesc: Use OVHcloud DNS servers. Recommended for OVHcloud services.
change.optionExternalDesc: Use external DNS servers. You will manage DNS records externally.
change.warning: Changing DNS servers may affect your services availability.
